input.sentences: creepy holloween couple sure to scare .
halloween dress up party for the ages .
excited group of friends stopping for a picture .
this green goblin is just hanging out .
the group mingling as the festivities begin .
output.sentences: The couple dressed up for Halloween, allowing for a creepy, scary Jack Skellington and a pretty Sally.
Some Halloween party goers dressed in simple attire, unconcerned about winning prizes.
The party givers shared their photographer as friends stopped and posed for pictures.
The hanging green goblin wasn't pleased with the non-alcoholic punch.
As the night wore on, the people mingled and danced and carried on their Halloween festivities.
